Name: Lead Pipe
desc: A heavy leaden pipe. A symbol of your furious rebellion

Name: Tiny Knife
desc: A small knife. Sharp, but of poor construction

Name: Stone Axe
desc: A crude ax made from carved stone

Name: Dirt Coating
desc: A thin layer of dirt indicating how badly this beast needs a bath

Name: Prison Rags
desc: The clothes from your days in prison, still stained with sweat

Name: Wooden Charm
desc: A relic of a peaceful time you barely remember

Name: Small Rock
desc: Many monsters find and grow attacked to small pebbles they find

Name: Spiked Branch
desc: A thorn covered branch. Make sure you hold the right end

Name: Iron Band
desc: This small iron band has a pleasing coolness

Name: Clown Costume
desc: Become the silliest of them all

Name: Leather Pelt
desc: A simple pelt made from animal leather

Name: Kunai
desc: A ninja's kunai that could be easily held by a small creature
